00026 void nargchk(bool cond)
00027 {
00028     if (!cond)
00029         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");

00033 Ptr<flann::IndexParams> createIndexParams(const MxArray& m)
00034 {
00035     Ptr<flann::IndexParams> p(NULL);
00036     vector<MxArray> rhs(m.toVector<MxArray>());
00037     if (rhs.empty() || (rhs.size()%2)==0)
00038         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid argument");
00039     string type(rhs[0].toString());
00040     if (type == "Linear")
00041         p = new flann::LinearIndexParams();
00042     else if (type == "KDTree") {
00043         int trees = 4;
00044         for (int i=1; i<rhs.size(); i+=2) {
00045             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00046             if (key == "Trees")
00047                 trees = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00048             else
00049                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00050         }
00051         p = new flann::KDTreeIndexParams(trees);
00052     }
00053     else if (type == "KMeans") {
00054         int branching = 32;
00055         int iterations = 11;
00056         cvflann::flann_centers_init_t centers_init = cvflann::CENTERS_RANDOM;
00057         float cb_index = 0.2;
00058         for (int i=1; i<rhs.size(); i+=2) {
00059             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00060             if (key == "Branching")
00061                 branching = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00062             else if (key == "Iterations")
00063                 iterations = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00064             else if (key == "CentersInit")
00065                 centers_init = CentersInit[rhs[i+1].toString()];
00066             else if (key == "CBIndex")
00067                 cb_index = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00068             else
00069                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00070         }
00071         p = new flann::KMeansIndexParams(
00072             branching, iterations, centers_init, cb_index);
00073     }
00074     else if (type == "Composite") {
00075         int trees = 4;
00076         int branching = 32;
00077         int iterations = 11;
00078         cvflann::flann_centers_init_t centers_init = cvflann::CENTERS_RANDOM;
00079         float cb_index = 0.2;
00080         for (int i=1; i<rhs.size(); i+=2) {
00081             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00082             if (key == "Trees")
00083                 trees = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00084             else if (key == "Branching")
00085                 branching = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00086             else if (key == "Iterations")
00087                 iterations = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00088             else if (key == "CentersInit")
00089                 centers_init = CentersInit[rhs[i+1].toString()];
00090             else if (key == "CBIndex")
00091                 cb_index = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00092             else
00093                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00094         }
00095         p = new flann::CompositeIndexParams(trees,
00096             branching, iterations, centers_init, cb_index);
00097     }
00098     else if (type == "LSH") {
00099         unsigned int table_number = 20;
00100         unsigned int key_size = 15;
00101         unsigned int multi_probe_level = 0;
00102         for (int i=1; i<rhs.size(); i+=2) {
00103             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00104             if (key == "TableNumber")
00105                 table_number = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00106             else if (key == "KeySize")
00107                 key_size = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00108             else if (key == "MultiProbeLevel")
00109                 multi_probe_level = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00110             else
00111                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00112         }
00113         p = new flann::LshIndexParams(table_number, key_size, multi_probe_level);
00114     }
00115     else if (type == "Autotuned") {
00116         float target_precision = 0.9;
00117         float build_weight = 0.01;
00118         float memory_weight = 0;
00119         float sample_fraction = 0.1;
00120         for (int i=1; i<rhs.size(); i+=2) {
00121             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00122             if (key == "TargetPrecision")
00123                 target_precision = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00124             else if (key == "BuildWeight")
00125                 build_weight = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00126             else if (key == "MemoryWeight")
00127                 memory_weight = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00128             else if (key == "SampleFraction")
00129                 sample_fraction = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00130             else
00131                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00132         }
00133         p = new flann::AutotunedIndexParams(target_precision,
00134             build_weight, memory_weight, sample_fraction);
00135     }
00136     else if (type == "Saved") {
00137         if (rhs.size()!=2)
00138             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Missing filename");
00139         string filename(rhs[1].toString());
00140         p = new flann::SavedIndexParams(filename);
00141         if (p.empty())
00142             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Failed to load index");
00143     }
00144     else
00145         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized index type");
00146     return p;
00147 }

00150 Ptr<flann::SearchParams> createSearchParams(const MxArray& m)
00151 {
00152     vector<MxArray> rhs(m.toVector<MxArray>());
00153     nargchk((rhs.size()%2)==0);
00154     int checks = 32;
00155     float eps = 0;
00156     bool sorted = true;
00157     for (int i=0; i<rhs.size(); i+=2) {
00158         string key(rhs[i].toString());
00159         if (key == "Checks")
00160             checks = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00161         else if (key == "EPS")
00162             eps = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00163         else if (key == "Sorted")
00164             sorted = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00165         else
00166             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00167     }
00168     return Ptr<flann::SearchParams>(new flann::SearchParams(checks,eps,sorted));
00169 }

00172 Ptr<DescriptorMatcher> createFlannBasedMatcher(const vector<MxArray>& rhs)
00173 {
00174     Ptr<flann::IndexParams> indexParams(NULL);
00175     Ptr<flann::SearchParams> searchParams(NULL);
00176     for (int i=0; i<rhs.size(); i+=2) {
00177         string key(rhs[i].toString());
00178         if (key == "Index")
00179             indexParams = createIndexParams(rhs[i+1]);
00180         else if (key == "Search")
00181             searchParams = createSearchParams(rhs[i+1]);
00182         else
00183             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00184     }
00185     if (indexParams.empty())
00186         indexParams = new flann::KDTreeIndexParams();
00187     if (searchParams.empty())
00188         searchParams = new flann::SearchParams();
00189     return Ptr<DescriptorMatcher>(new FlannBasedMatcher(indexParams,searchParams));
00190 }

00201 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00202                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00203 {
00204     nargchk(nrhs>=2 && nlhs<=1);
00205     
00206     // Determine argument format between constructor or (id,method,...)
00207     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00208     int id = rhs[0].toInt();
00209     string method = rhs[1].toString();
00210 
00211     if (last_id==0)
00212         initModule_nonfree();
00213     
00214     // Big operation switch
00215     if (method == "new") {
00216         nargchk(nrhs>=3);
00217         string descriptorMatcherType(rhs[2].toString());
00218         obj_[++last_id] = (nrhs>=4 && descriptorMatcherType=="FlannBased") ?
00219             createFlannBasedMatcher(vector<MxArray>(prhs+3, prhs+nrhs)) :
00220             DescriptorMatcher::create(descriptorMatcherType);
00221         plhs[0] = MxArray(last_id);
00222         return;
00223     }
00224     Ptr<DescriptorMatcher> obj = obj_[id];
00225     if (method == "delete") {
00226         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs==0);
00227         obj_.erase(id);
00228     }
00229     else if (method == "type") {
00230         nargchk(nrhs==2);
00231         plhs[0] = MxArray(string(typeid(*obj).name()));
00232     }
00233     else if (method == "add") {
00234         nargchk(nrhs==3 && nlhs==0);
00235         vector<MxArray> v(rhs[2].toVector<MxArray>());
00236         vector<Mat> descriptors;
00237         descriptors.reserve(v.size());
00238         for (vector<MxArray>::iterator it=v.begin();it<v.end();++it)
00239             descriptors.push_back(((*it).isUint8()) ? (*it).toMat() : (*it).toMat(CV_32F));
00240         obj->add(descriptors);
00241     }
00242     else if (method == "getTrainDescriptors") {
00243         nargchk(nrhs==2);
00244         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj->getTrainDescriptors());
00245     }
00246     else if (method == "clear") {
00247         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs==0);
00248         obj->clear();
00249     }
00250     else if (method == "empty") {
00251         nargchk(nrhs==2);
00252         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj->empty());
00253     }
00254     else if (method == "isMaskSupported") {
00255         nargchk(nrhs==2);
00256         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj->isMaskSupported());
00257     }
00258     else if (method == "train") {
00259         nargchk(nrhs==2);
00260         obj->train();
00261     }
00262     else if (method == "match") {
00263         nargchk(nrhs>=3);
00264         Mat queryDescriptors((rhs[2].isUint8()) ? rhs[2].toMat() : rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00265         vector<DMatch> matches;
00266         if (nrhs>=4 && rhs[3].isNumeric()) { // First format
00267             nargchk((nrhs%2)==0);
00268             Mat trainDescriptors((rhs[3].isUint8()) ? rhs[3].toMat() : rhs[3].toMat(CV_32F));
00269             Mat mask;
00270             for (int i=4; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00271                 string key(rhs[i].toString());
00272                 if (key=="Mask")
00273                     mask = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_8U);
00274                 else
00275                     mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00276             }
00277             obj->match(queryDescriptors, trainDescriptors, matches, mask);
00278         }
00279         else { // Second format
00280             nargchk((nrhs%2)==1);
00281             vector<Mat> masks;
00282             for (int i=3; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00283                 string key(rhs[i].toString());
00284                 if (key=="Mask")
00285                     masks = rhs[i+1].toVector<Mat>();
00286                 else
00287                     mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00288             }
00289             obj->match(queryDescriptors, matches, masks);
00290         }
00291         plhs[0] = MxArray(matches);
00292     }
00293     else if (method == "knnMatch") {
00294         nargchk(nrhs>=4);
00295         Mat queryDescriptors((rhs[2].isUint8()) ? rhs[2].toMat() : rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00296         vector<vector<DMatch> > matches;
00297         if (nrhs>=5 && rhs[3].isNumeric() && rhs[4].isNumeric()) { // First format
00298             nargchk((nrhs%2)==1);
00299             Mat trainDescriptors((rhs[3].isUint8()) ? rhs[3].toMat() : rhs[3].toMat(CV_32F));
00300             int k = rhs[4].toInt();
00301             Mat mask;
00302             bool compactResult=false;
00303             for (int i=5; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00304                 string key(rhs[i].toString());
00305                 if (key=="Mask")
00306                     mask = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_8U);
00307                 else if (key=="CompactResult")
00308                     compactResult = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00309                 else
00310                     mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00311             }
00312             obj->knnMatch(queryDescriptors, trainDescriptors, matches, k, mask,
00313                 compactResult);
00314         }
00315         else { // Second format
00316             nargchk((nrhs%2)==0);
00317             int k = rhs[3].toInt();
00318             vector<Mat> masks;
00319             bool compactResult=false;
00320             for (int i=4; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00321                 string key(rhs[i].toString());
00322                 if (key=="Mask")
00323                     masks = rhs[i+1].toVector<Mat>();
00324                 else if (key=="CompactResult")
00325                     compactResult = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00326                 else
00327                     mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00328             }
00329             obj->knnMatch(queryDescriptors, matches, k, masks, compactResult);
00330         }
00331         plhs[0] = MxArray(matches);
00332     }
00333     else if (method == "radiusMatch") {
00334         nargchk(nrhs>=4);
00335         Mat queryDescriptors((rhs[2].isUint8()) ? rhs[2].toMat() : rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00336         vector<vector<DMatch> > matches;
00337         if (nrhs>=5 && rhs[3].isNumeric() && rhs[4].isNumeric()) { // First format
00338             nargchk((nrhs%2)==1);
00339             Mat trainDescriptors((rhs[3].isUint8()) ? rhs[3].toMat() : rhs[3].toMat(CV_32F));
00340             float maxDistance = rhs[4].toDouble();
00341             Mat mask;
00342             bool compactResult=false;
00343             for (int i=5; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00344                 string key(rhs[i].toString());
00345                 if (key=="Mask")
00346                     mask = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_8U);
00347                 else if (key=="CompactResult")
00348                     compactResult = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00349                 else
00350                     mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00351             }
00352             obj->radiusMatch(queryDescriptors, trainDescriptors, matches, 
00353                 maxDistance, mask, compactResult);
00354         }
00355         else { // Second format
00356             nargchk((nrhs%2)==0);
00357             float maxDistance = rhs[3].toDouble();
00358             vector<Mat> masks;
00359             bool compactResult=false;
00360             for (int i=4; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00361                 string key(rhs[i].toString());
00362                 if (key=="Mask")
00363                     masks = rhs[i+1].toVector<Mat>();
00364                 else if (key=="CompactResult")
00365                     compactResult = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00366                 else
00367                     mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00368             }
00369             obj->radiusMatch(queryDescriptors, matches, maxDistance, masks, compactResult);
00370         }
00371         plhs[0] = MxArray(matches);
00372     }
00373     else if (method == "read") {
00374         nargchk(nrhs==3 && nlhs==0);
00375         FileStorage fs(rhs[2].toString(),FileStorage::READ);
00376         obj->read(fs.root());
00377     }
00378     else if (method == "write") {
00379         nargchk(nrhs==3 && nlhs==0);
00380         FileStorage fs(rhs[2].toString(),FileStorage::WRITE);
00381         obj->write(fs);
00382     }
00383     else
00384         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized operation");
